talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Royal Guard Roy$
{user_nick}, there's a message from the Royal Castle. You have been summoned to come to the castle right now.

${user_nick}$
The Royal Castle?

$Royal Guard Roy$
Yes, I don't know about the details but I heard something about Anu Arendel's messenger.

${user_nick}$
Anu Arendel…!
(Does that mean…)

$Royal Guard Roy$
His Highness is waiting for you.
Please make your way.(Roy bows politely and walks away. Go to Royal Castle)

$Elf Elder$
The news must have arrived by now.
(Meet King Cassius)

$Duke Stuart$
It has been so long since you have been called for. Why are you here only now?
Everyone, don't you think we have been trusting this adventurer too much?
This person probably has no idea what's being done.
(Stuart looks unhappy)

$Terrence Terramai$
Good to see you, {user_nick}. We just got a message from Elf Elder.
There's an intruder at the entrance of the Monolith.
The movement of the Dragon Followers seem alarming too.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I also received a report that intruder of the Monolith was wearing the Dragon Follower's mask.
So all this is due to the Dragon Followers.
Let's take this chance to burn all of them! Save the world and kill the Dragon Followers too!

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
It's a pity that we can't enter the Monolith, but there's no choice.
We don't know what might happen if we go in there, and the Elves have been protecting that place since the beginning of this world...
We have no choice but to trust them.

$Duke Stuart$
(Stuart still looks unhappy)
Let me say this again, there would be no support from me.
I will only use my forces in protecting Saint Haven.

$General Douglas$
I can't give much support too as my soldiers are busy fighting the monsters.
It will probably be Terramai's Templar Knights and Kayleen's Royal Sorceresses who would be going to Anu Arendel,
but I will still get some troops ready for emergency.

$Terrence Terramai$
That would be enough. Anu Arendel isn't a big so not many soldiers are needed at first.
Besides fighting the Dragon Followers, we should always keep in mind that we should protect Anu Arendel.
Then {user_nick}... since you are the one who has notified the Royal Castle of this issue, the King has issued a royal command.

${user_nick}$
Okay.

$King Cassius$
E-ehem! Urrhem! Eeeehhkkkehm!
(Cassius is clearing his throat a bit too much.)

$King Cassius$
W-we are at a v-v-very dangerous s-situation...
(Cassius reads the words on the scroll with his hands shaking vigorously. Stuart is worriedly looking at the young king too)

$King Cassius$
M-monolith in d-d-danger means this w-w-world in danger. As I understand the s-severity of this issue, I request the Elf Elder f-for cooperation f-f-from the Elves. {user_nick}, your c-contribution has b-been highly r-r-recognized.

$King Cassius$
Th-this m-m-m-moment! Is a v-v-very meaningful m-m-moment. We will j-j-join hands with the Elves. And… we… we… we are g-going to r-recover the g-g-glory of the h-h-heroes of the p-past.

$King Cassius$
We are ready to f-f-fight the crisis instead of running f-f-from it..!
{user_nick}, c-convey this m-m-message to Elf Elder.

$King Cassius$
(Cassius hands over the scroll with his face pale like he will pass out any moment. Take it quickly)

$Duke Stuart$
His Highness didn't read the entire scroll.
The size of our army and the future plans are also in the scroll so deliver it safely.
You will be held responsible if it is somehow damaged.

${user_nick}$
Understood.
(It feels like the scroll may get wet from the sweaty palms…)

$Terrence Terramai$
We will send our soldiers soon so don't worry.
(Terramai pats your shoulder like he's trying to comfort you)

$Terrence Terramai$
…We won't be shifting the responsibility like last time.
There is bound to be people who disagree in whatever happens so don't worry about it too much.
(Terramai speaks as he stares at Stuart)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
So, the clerics will do more than twiddle their thumbs for once. I appreciate Terrence Terramai's... eagerness to help. It's so unlikely of that toad Ignacio.
(Kayleen is looking at Terramai)

$Duke Stuart$
I'm sure I needn't warn you what will happen if you betray us...
(There are dark rings under the duke's eyes.)

$General Douglas$
Your courage is an inspiration to us all.

$Argenta$
Do your job.

$Geraint$
(He looks unhappy)

$King Cassius$
B-b-be safe, my friend...
(Cassius speaks in hushed tones. Visit the Elf Elder.)

$Elf Elder$
Welcome back. Have you delivered my message to the Royal Castle?

${user_nick}$
Well, of course. Here's the reply.
(Hand over Cassius's scroll)

$Elf Elder${action:Talk}
Hmm.(Elf Elder unrolls the scroll and reads it)
… Looks like Terrence put in a good word for us.
According to this, you'll be working directly with me, is that right, {user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
Hmm? Is there something for me to do?

$Elf Elder$
(The Elf Elder wears a grim frown.)
Our new King would like to speak with you. Our dragon friends are also waiting. Would you follow me into the Tree of Life?

${user_nick}$
The new king…!

$Elf Elder$
(The Elf Elder forces a strained smile)
Yes. {user_nick}, you know him well too.
You'll recognize him as soon as you enter.

${user_nick}$
Okay. (Enter the Tree of Life)

$Elf King Federeth${action:See}
Welcome. We're meeting for the first time after I've changed.
(The Elf King moves his body that looks uncomfortable)

${user_nick}$
Yuvenciel...?

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9410_qu_01.ogg}
Please call me Federeth. Like the previous Queens, I've gained a new name as I took the throne.
(Federeth smiles)

$Argenta$
Stop rambling and get to the main point.
I'm not so free to be here to see the two of you have a chit-chat!

$Elf King Federeth${action:Smile}
… All good things come in their own time, my dear Silver Dragon. A little patience will do wonders.

$Argenta${action:Hwww}
You're the one who's making me lose patience!!
But...(Argenta gives you a quick glance) it looks like what you said is true.

$Elf King Federeth$
I wouldn't dare lie to the Silver Dragon! I have checked that Chaos Dragon's power has spread all across Anu Arendel. And one of them is shining from {user_nick}.

$Argenta$
{user_nick}, did you kill the Chaos Dragon? But it looks like you didn't absorb the jewel. What happened?

${user_nick}$
No I didn't kill him… well, Iona was…
(Tell her what happened)

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9410_qu_01.ogg}
White Dragon Iona?! Are you talking about that ball of energy… It was ages ago that I last saw it, how can it still be around? And it just gave its power to you and disappeared? Well, fools recognize fools so well. You guys must get along really well.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9410_qu_01.ogg}
You spared a Chaos Dragon?
I didn't hear about that before.
(Geraint turns grumpy)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Your heart is pounding in your chest) It's an honour.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Well, it's a long story. Whatever the case, if you have the power of Chaos Dragon you should be able to move even when you get to the Monolith. Yuvenciel, it looks like we have a servant just like you said.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I won't be a burden to you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Hmph.(Doesn't even listen)
So the three of us - Geraint, I, and the servant - can go near the Monolith entrance now.
But if you do anything foolish, I'll make sure you're chased out of Anu Arendel so keep that in mind!

$Argenta$
…Know your place.
Don't do anything other than what I tell you to do.
Not even orders from the king or the Elf Elder.

$Argenta${action:Talk_Angry}
Honestly I don't like you guys either.
If you let the Dragon Follower scums get near the Monolith like what happened during the Conclave, you'll get it from me.

$Elf King Federeth$
Well, of course my lady. We won't be attacked hands down like what happened in the Conclave.
We will do our best to stop them.

$Elf Elder$
(He is glaring at the King fiercely)
..There isn't any traitors among us anymore. The humans have promised to join forces too.

$Argenta$
What?(Argenta's eyes widen with surprise.)
The humans? They finally realize that it isn't their lands that are under attack, don't they?
The Dragon Followers and the Black Dragon must have taught them a good lesson.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9427_qu_08.ogg}
{user_nick} here has worked hard to persuade them for action.
That is how it all worked out.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I just thoght it would be better if we joined forces.</html>
<html>I'm not a young kid who considers this as a game.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
What? You?(Argenta looks a little suprised)
Hah! Are you trying to copy Geraint?
Or you want to play the "hero", huh?!

$Argenta$
Hahaha! You make it sound so glorious.
It's amazing that the humans have faith in you! Haha!

${user_nick}$
(Is that a compliment or what...)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There are lessons to learn even from defeat.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9410_qu_02.ogg}
Talking about old me again? Old Geraint was a loser, wasn't I? Why do you want to copy that?

$Geraint$
Hmph! Am I to congratulate you for gathering a herd of useless sheep to fight a dragon? If we're lucky, they'll all die before they have a chance to get in my way!

$Argenta$
They will spare us from wasting our time on those stupid Dragon Followers and let us focus on the Monolith. But this conversation bores me. I'm leaving.

$Elf King Federeth$
Stay safe, my charming Silver Dragon.

$Elf Elder$
I'll take my leave as well.
Please rest, my King.

$Argenta$
What are you looking at? Do your own job.
(Talk to Elf King Federeth)

$Geraint${action:Talk}
Are those two not on good terms?
Well, it's none of my business.
(Talk to Elf King Federeth)

$Elf Elder$
I didn't expect Yuvenciel to become the king but…
I'm just doing my duty. If he has enough grace to be the King.
(Talk to Elf King Federeth)

$Elf King Federeth${action:See}
...Please don't look at me like that. We're allies now, remember?
(Federeth bows. Go outside and talk to Argenta.)

$Argenta$
I'll tell you what to do now. Pay attention.

$Argenta$
If you can't keep up, I will abandon you. I don't care if you convince a thousand kingdoms to fight for you. Mortal armies mean nothing in the Monolith, and the only thing you can rely on is yourself.

${user_nick}$
I'm ready for this.

$Geraint$
…What the heck have I been doing in the past?
(He looks grumpy)
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
(Argenta ignores Geraint)
Hmph, {user_nick}… you answer more confidently now. That's better.
Good. There's more to explain to you.

$Geraint$
(He looks grumpy)

$Argenta$
Seriously.... All those that become king are...
(Argenta mumbles something to herself in irritation. Go outside and talk to her)

$Elf Elder$
I'll take my leave as well.
(Go outside and talk to Argenta)

journal.title: The War Begins 1
journal.contents:
Royal Guard Roy has passed you a message from King Cassius.
Go to Saint Haven Royal Castle to meet Cassius.

Saint Haven Royal Castle - King Cassius

journal.title: The War Begins 2
journal.contents:
You have received the scroll from King Cassius.
Deliver it to Elf Elder in Anu Arendel.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Elder
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the scroll to Elf Elder in Anu Arendel.

journal.title: The War Begins 3
journal.contents:
Go inside the Tree of Life and meet Yuvenciel who has become the Elf King.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Inside the Tree of Life (Elf King Federeth)
journal.todo_msg: Go inside the Tree of Life and meet Elf King Federeth.

journal.title: The War Begins 4
journal.contents:
You have met Elf King Federeth. Looks like you'll be following Argenta around from now on thanks to him.
Discuss with Argenta what to do next.

Anu Arendel - Argenta
journal.todo_msg: Go outside the Tree of Life and talk to Argenta.
